trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允許將 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This permission is used by classes that provide information about network connections and traffic statistics such as those in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 此權限由類別，可提供網路連線的相關資訊，並流量統計資料，例如中<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 命令式安全性，使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> value that specifies the permission behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 值，指定使用權限的行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermissionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermissionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The security action defines which callers must have the permission.
trans-unit.target: 「 安全性 」 動作定義的呼叫端必須具備權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the network information access level.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定網路資訊存取層級。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the access level.
trans-unit.target: 指定存取層級的字串。

trans-unit.source: The valid values for this property are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的有效值會顯示下表中。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Read"
trans-unit.target: 「 讀取 」

trans-unit.source: Read access to network information.
trans-unit.target: 網路資訊的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: "Full"
trans-unit.target: 「 完整 」

trans-unit.source: Full access to network information.
trans-unit.target: 網路資訊的完整存取。

trans-unit.source: "None"
No access to network information.
trans-unit.target: 沒有網路資訊的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" />，會對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 只應該由應用程式程式碼永遠不會由安全性系統中，呼叫這個方法。
